title: 820-2641 with slowness when starting the machine.
message: This iMac, suffered contact with liquid in the region of the GPU connector and memories, where I cleaned and tinned some points. The machine takes a long time to raise the macOS.

title: 820-2641 with slowness when starting the machine.
message:
Could be ME region issue.
But should disconnect internal HDD first and try your USB test macOS.

title: 820-2641 with slowness when starting the machine.
message: I already noticed this test of the disconnected HD and go up through external macOS, I will clean the BIOS region ME ok?

title: 820-2641 with slowness when starting the machine.
message: If still slow through USB, then clean ME region and test again.

title: 820-2641 with slowness when starting the machine.
message:
friend you can clean up ME region of this BIOS, I'm not getting it. 
  [URL]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qvZkIB0eDwvI7pIB5GLF_9ucACNw05yF/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: 820-2641 with slowness when starting the machine.
message: I think I did some shit, after cleaning the ME region, the machine is not showing image, only giving 2 led. I think I inverted the HD cable in the SOURCE.
